2014-03-16

50 films: 1971 - They Might Be Giants

I'd not really heard of the film but the premise sounded intriguing. It's charming and funny, it has a message that is subtly and sweetly delivered, and it is well acted - particularly by the two leads. It is far from perfect, but a watcher all the same.

It's also treated with another great John Barry score.

50 films and 50 albums
